mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.EMPLOYEE_ID, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE_NUMBER, A.HIRE_DATE, A.JOB_ID, A.SALARY, A.COMMISSION_PCT, A.MANAGER_ID, A.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HIRE_DATE DESC) AS RN, EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT, MANAGER_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT, MANAGER_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE 1 = 1 AND ${column} = TRIM(#{query})
